original_text: God's bread is the one who comes down from heaven. He is the one who gives life to people in the world.’
korean_text: 하나님의 떡은 하늘에서 내려 세상에 생명을 주는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: God's bread is the one who comes down from heaven.
He is the one who gives life to people in the world.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세상에 있는 사람들에게 생명을 주시는 분이십니다.
